name: onit-contracts
description: Smart contracts and tests for Onit accounts
author: Onit Labs Ltd

scripts.test:prod: FOUNDRY_PROFILE=prod forge build; pnpm run test
scripts.deploy: sh -c 'forge script script/deploy/$1.s.sol:$1 --rpc-url $(grep $2"_RPC_URL" .env | cut -d "=" -f2) --chain-id $(grep $2"_CHAIN_ID" .env | cut -d "=" -f2)  --private-key $(grep $2"_PRIVATE_KEY" .env | cut -d "=" -f2) --etherscan-api-key  $(grep $2"_EXPLORER_API_KEY" .env | cut -d "=" -f2) $(if [ "$3" = "b" ]; then echo "--verify --broadcast --legacy"; fi)' --
